data.seo_title: Wool Felt Pennants, Camp Flags, Banners, and more from Oxford Pennant.

product.title: Bold Will Hold Camp Flag
product.body_html:
The classics never fade.

This camp flag is part of our Shopkeepers Collection, inspired by our friends in the tattoo and service industry.

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Gold body, black details
product.tags: camp flag, HOL 2020 stock update, Pre-Sale, Tattoo

product.title: Everything Is Going To Be Alright In The End Eye Chart Camp Flag • Holy Smokes x Oxford Pennant
product.body_html:
"Celebrate everything" meets "Make fun of everything." This camp flag is part of our collaboration with Holy Smokes, a super talented designer, illustrator and Buffalo's native son Cody Weiler.

Size: 10.5" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: White body, multi details
product.tags: camp flag, every, Everything, Eye Chart, HOL 2020 stock update, Holy Smokes, Pre-Sale, thing

product.title: Believe Camp Flag
product.body_html:
Wow! This design is one of our best sellers! We are constantly sewing & printing new inventory to keep up with demand. At times, your order may take up to two weeks to ship. We’ll send tracking information as soon as it heads out!

Do you believe in miracles? A camp flag inspired by one of our favorite shows, for those moments when you need a little reminder.

Size: 16" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Gold body, royal details
product.tags: #lasso, #ted, #tedlasso, believe, camp flag, HOL 2020 stock update, miracle

product.title: NYC Camp Flag
product.body_html:

This design is also available as a t-shirt. 

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Navy body, Cream details
